Package dev.vernite.vernite.integration.git.github.api

Interface GitHubApiClient

@HttpExchange(accept="application/vnd.github.v3+json") public interface GitHubApiClient
The GitHub API service. This is the entry point for all GitHub API calls.

  • Method Details

    • createOauthAccessToken

      @PostExchange("https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<OauthToken> createOauthAccessToken(@RequestBody OauthTokenRequest oauthTokenRequest)
      Get the OAuth access token.
      Parameters:
      oauthTokenRequest - the OAuth token request
      Returns:
      the access token

    • refreshOauthAccessToken

      @PostExchange("https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<OauthToken> refreshOauthAccessToken(@RequestBody OauthRefreshTokenRequest oauthRefreshTokenRequest)
      Refresh the OAuth access token.
      Parameters:
      oauthRefreshTokenRequest - the OAuth refresh token request
      Returns:
      the refreshed access token

    • getAuthenticatedUser

      @GetExchange("/user") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GitHubUser> getAuthenticatedUser(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String authorization)
      Get the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the authorization header
      Returns:
      the authenticated user

    • getUserInstallations

      @GetExchange("/user/installations") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Installations> getUserInstallations(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String authorization)
      Get the authenticated user's installations.
      Parameters:
      authorization - the authorization header
      Returns:
      the authenticated user's installations

    • createInstallationAccessToken

      @PostExchange("/app/installations/{id}/access_tokens") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<AppToken> createInstallationAccessToken(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String jwt, @PathVariable long id)
      Create app access token.
      Parameters:
      jwt - JSON web token
      id - id of installation
      Returns:
      the access token

    • getInstallationRepositories

      @GetExchange("/installation/repositories") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Repositories> getInstallationRepositories(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Get the installation repositories.
      Parameters:
      token - installation access token
      Returns:
      the installations repositories

    • getRepositoryIssues

      @GetExchange("/repos/{owner}/{name}/issues") reactor.core.publisher.Flux<GitHubIssue> getRepositoryIssues(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable String owner, @PathVariable String name)
      Get the repository issues.
      Parameters:
      token - installation access token
      owner - owner of repository
      name - name of repository
      Returns:
      the repository issues

    • getRepositoryIssue

      @GetExchange("/repos/{owner}/{name}/issues/{issueNumber}") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GitHubIssue> getRepositoryIssue(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable String owner, @PathVariable String name, @PathVariable long issueNumber)
      Get the repository issue.
      Parameters:
      token - installation access token
      owner - owner of repository
      name - name of repository
      issueNumber - issue number
      Returns:
      the repository issue

    • createRepositoryIssue

      @PostExchange("/repos/{owner}/{name}/issues") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GitHubIssue> createRepositoryIssue(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable String owner, @PathVariable String name, @RequestBody GitHubIssue body)
      Create a repository issue.
      Parameters:
      token - installation access token
      owner - owner of repository
      name - name of repository
      body - issue body
      Returns:
      the created issue

    • patchRepositoryIssue

      @PatchExchange("/repos/{owner}/{name}/issues/{id}") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GitHubIssue> patchRepositoryIssue(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable String owner, @PathVariable String name, @PathVariable long id, @RequestBody GitHubIssue body)
      Patch a repository issue.
      Parameters:
      token - installation access token
      owner - owner of repository
      name - name of repository
      id - id of issue
      body - issue body
      Returns:
      the patched issue

    • patchRepositoryPullRequest

      @PatchExchange("/repos/{owner}/{name}/pulls/{id}") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GitHubPullRequest> patchRepositoryPullRequest(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable String owner, @PathVariable String name, @PathVariable long id, @RequestBody GitHubPullRequest body)
      Patch a repository pull request.
      Parameters:
      token - installation access token
      owner - owner of repository
      name - name of repository
      id - id of issue
      body - pull request body
      Returns:
      the patched pull request

    • mergePullRequest

      Parameters:

      owner - owner of repository
      name - name of repository
      id - id of pull request
      Returns:
      the merge response

      name - name of repository
      issueNumber - issue number
      body - comment body

    • patchIssueComment

      @PatchExchange("/repos/{owner}/{name}/issues/comments/{commentId}") reactor.core.publisher.Mono<GitHubComment> patchIssueComment(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable String owner, @PathVariable String name, @PathVariable long commentId, @RequestBody GitHubComment body)
      Patch a repository issue comment.
